original_title: プッシーキャット大作戦
overview: Three curvaceous go-go dancers (Kei Mizutani, Nao Eguchi and Yukari Nunokawa) on a rampage, looking for a big bag  of cash that might be hidden in the kitchen of wheelchair-bound gangster. Director Ryuichi Honda keeps it flush  with 60s flavors, mood-indigo music, paisley-print fashions in dayglo colors, outrageous zooms and dizzying pans,  and best of all, it looks like it was made on a budget of 10 dollars - and when the money ran out the film ended.
title: Pussycat Great Mission!
